backend/main.mo: Defines cemetery data models, public view types, site content structures, and comparison utilities for grave and person records.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking tooltip readability improvements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables for light and dark themes and applies base styling to elements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wrapper handling authentication, theme, routing between public and admin views, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access-denied message for non-admin users with a logout option.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Interactive map component that displays cemetery alleys and graves, allows selecting a grave, and opens an edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: UI for managing cemetery layout, enabling adding and removing alleys and graves with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Dialog for creating or editing grave records, including status, payment, deceased persons, and owner details.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Grave listing and search interface with pagination, filtering, and creation of new graves.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for image loading, data URL conversion, and resizing images to a max size returning a Uint8Array.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Image upload and editing component that previews, resizes, and saves images with progress tracking.
Generates a PDF of cemetery records by assembling HTML from graves and cemetery data and triggers download. Includes formatting helpers and loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Provides an admin interface to edit site content including hero, footer, prayer, and cemetery sections with image uploads and save handlers.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Shows backend connection status with retry functionality and alerts for disconnected states.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating login button for unauthenticated users using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer that loads backend-managed site contact info with fallback data and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Displays paginated grave search results for admins and public users with status badges, edit dialog support, and load‑more functionality.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Implements admin and public grave search with debounced filtering, full‑text indices, and paginated admin data loading.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Renders the cemetery map using public tile data, including status legends and lazy‑mounted alley grids.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows site header with logo, theme toggle, and logout button using public site content and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays configurable hero banner with background image, headline, and fallback loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/LazyMount.tsx: Mounts children only when near viewport using an in‑view hook to optimize heavy component rendering.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save basic profile information with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Provides four interactive tiles for navigating to map, search, prayer, and about sections.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Shows a warning banner when public site content cannot be loaded, falling back to default messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs periodic backend health checks using the actor and exposes connection status with a manual recheck function.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value updated after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, login/logout, and exposing status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Detects when an element enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver, supporting thresholds and trigger-once behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data with caching, retry logic, error handling, and mutations for various site operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus global transitions and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tab‑based navigation and lazy‑loaded management components.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Implements the public-facing page with tile navigation, search/map tabs, and optional prayer/about sections loaded from site content.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Provides helpers to detect authorization and connectivity errors, including special Boss-lock checks.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Implements text normalization and in-memory full‑text search utilities for graves in admin and public modes.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Maps grave statuses to Tailwind-based colors, labels, and badge variants for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and theme settings with custom variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, feature requests, and current project state for the Cemetery Portal.
